item.title: TODO ansible 201802
item.description:
Ansible tower Ansible awx Ansible for magento Ansible + jenkins install latest ansible apt-add-repository ppa:ansible/ansible [ENTER] apt update apt-get install ansible
install latest docker apt-add-repository ppa:ansible/ansibleapt updateapt-get install ansible curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo apt-key add -add-apt-repository \   "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu \   $(lsb_release -cs) \   stable"apt updateapt-get install docker-ce apt install makeapt install python-pippip install dockerpip install --upgrade pipapt install git curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/geerlingguy/awx-container/master/docker-compose.yml docker-compose up -d tunggu beberapa saat lalu akses via http, misal http://localhost dengan user admin/password
